news.title: Mohali civic body exceeds its property tax collection target by 10% in FY 2024-25
news.para: Looking ahead, the proposed budget for fiscal year 2025-26 projects property tax as the highest revenue source, with an estimated collection of Rs 55 crore. This marks a significant rise from Rs 45 crore collected in 2024-25.

news.title: Lucknow civic body introduces property tax details and payment link on WhatsApp
news.para: Other payment options include cash, cheque, or BBPS at zonal offices, online payments via the LMC website lmc.up.nic.in, and payments through HDFC and Axis Bank branches.

news.title: MCG to install 15,000 streetlights in Gurugram after minister order
news.para: In an official communication to the municipal corporations, the ULB department highlighted that municipal bodies acquired only 2.7 lakh (60%) LED streetlights of different wattages from the available 4.5 lakh LED streetlights under the rate contract.

news.title: Coimbatore revenue rises by 14.42% in 2024-25 through property registration
news.para: Registration department officials attribute this revenue growth to rising property transactions, stricter enforcement of registration policies and digitalisation efforts that have streamlined the processes and improved transparency.

news.title: Coimbatore civic body initiates GIS mapping of OSR lands
news.para: As of now, 500 parcels of OSR land have been identified and mapped using GIS technology. A senior civic body official said the data would soon be available on the corporation site.

news.title: MPCB takes action against 20 ready mix concrete projects in Pune
news.para: Apart from directing these projects to fix environmental norms violations, it issued orders to stop production at 18 projects. Four other interim orders were given against projects including forfeiture of bank guarantees.

news.title: Effective Strategies to Manage Your Home Loan EMI
news.para: Know the effective strategy to manage your home loan EMI and reduce financial stress. Tips to save money and stay on track with payments.

news.title: Kolhapur civic body keeps property tax rates unchanged in budget 2025
news.para: However, user charges for the Kolhapur Municipal Corporation (KMC) services will increase by around 10%. The budget prioritises revenue growth and disciplined spending.

news.title: LuLu mall project to be revived in Visakhapatnam
news.para: The state govt instructed the Andhra Pradesh Industrial Infrastructure Corporation (APIIC) to thoroughly assess the proposal from Lulu Group and obtain the approval of the competent authority for the early implementation of the project.

news.title: Lucknow: LDA to cancel allocation of properties of PMAY beneficiaries who are yet to register
news.para: The decision was made after a review of pending registration cases by LDA vice chairperson Prathamesh Kumar on Wednesday. He directed officials to prepare a cancellation proposal within a week.

news.title: Odisha government to amend land allotment rules for transparency: CM
news.para: The CM said the Odisha Govt Land Settlement Rules, 2020, which governs the land allotment process, will be amended to bring transparency in land allotment.

news.title: Pune civic body collects Rs 449 crore property tax from merged areas
news.para: A group of residents in these areas have opposed the tax levy, arguing that it is excessively high and does not correspond with the civic amenities provided. Their concerns led the state to place a stay on tax recovery.

news.title: No draw of lots for HSVP plots, will stick to auction system: Haryana minister
news.para: Mahipal Dhanda, categorically ruled out the possibility of discontinuing the auction of residential plots in the sectors to be developed by HSVP in the future.

news.title: Goa government to introduce comprehensive housing policy
news.para: The government will introduce a comprehensive housing policy through the Goa Housing Board to provide affordable housing for Goans, though specific details on eligibility and execution remain unclear.

news.title: Kerala CM to launch Wayanad model township on March 27
news.para: The township will provide 430 newly built homes on 7-cent plots for families who lost their houses and livelihoods in the landslides and flash floods of July 30, 2024.

news.title: NHB steps up surprise checks to gauge housing finance companies' health
news.para: Officers at the quasi-housing finance regulator are currently focusing on how refinancing funds are being used to ensure their proper allocation, the officials said.

news.title: Gurugram: Over 800 houses in DLF areas face OCs cancellations for flouting building code
news.para: The enforcement wing has also urged DLF management to disconnect water and sewer connections and requested DHBVN to snap power supply to these properties.

news.title: NCLAT allows LDA, others to become parties in Ansal group’s insolvency case
news.para: The move, following strong advocacy by LDA, is expected to reinforce the interests of homebuyers affected by the real estate giant's alleged violations of the Hi-Tech Township policy.

news.title: Circle rates in Noida set to rise by 20% in FY26, first in nine years
news.para: Property prices in Jewar are expected to see a jump because of a 70% hike in proposed circle rates, driven by the Noida International Airport, which is scheduled to open in May this year.

news.title: Now, builders in Mumbai can use ‘debris on call’ service
news.para: The inclusion of the 'Debris on Call' service in the 'Auto DCR' system, where developers seek permission for construction, will enable collection of debris from large development projects in the city.
